<a id="Slider"></a>

# Slider

**Inherits:** [Range](Range.md) **\<** [Control](Control.md) **\<** [CanvasItem](CanvasItem.md) **\<** [Node](Node.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

**Inherited By:** [HSlider](HSlider.md), [VSlider](VSlider.md)

Abstract base class for sliders.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Abstract base class for sliders, used to adjust a value by moving a grabber along a horizontal or vertical axis. Sliders are [Range](Range.md)-based controls.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Signals

<a id="Slider_signal_drag_ended"></a>

<!-- classref-signal -->

**drag_ended**\ (\ value_changed\: [bool](bool.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#Slider_signal_drag_ended)

Emitted when the grabber stops being dragged. If `value_changed` is ``true``, [Range.value](Range.md#Range_property_value) is different from the value when the dragging was started.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="Slider_signal_drag_started"></a>

<!-- classref-signal -->

**drag_started**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#Slider_signal_drag_started)

Emitted when the grabber starts being dragged. This is emitted before the corresponding [Range.value_changed](Range.md#Range_signal_value_changed) signal.

<hr class="classref-section-separator"/>

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Enumerations

<a id="enum_Slider_TickPosition"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration -->

enum **TickPosition**: [ðŸ”—](#enum_Slider_TickPosition)

<a id="Slider_constant_TICK_POSITION_BOTTOM_RIGHT"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[TickPosition](Slider.md#enum_Slider_TickPosition) **TICK_POSITION_BOTTOM_RIGHT** = `0`

Places the ticks at the bottom of the [HSlider](HSlider.md), or right of the [VSlider](VSlider.md).<a id="Slider_constant_TICK_POSITION_TOP_LEFT"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[TickPosition](Slider.md#enum_Slider_TickPosition) **TICK_POSITION_TOP_LEFT** = `1`

Places the ticks at the top of the [HSlider](HSlider.md), or left of the [VSlider](VSlider.md).<a id="Slider_constant_TICK_POSITION_BOTH"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[TickPosition](Slider.md#enum_Slider_TickPosition) **TICK_POSITION_BOTH** = `2`

Places the ticks at the both sides of the slider.<a id="Slider_constant_TICK_POSITION_CENTER"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[TickPosition](Slider.md#enum_Slider_TickPosition) **TICK_POSITION_CENTER** = `3`

Places the ticks at the center of the slider.<hr class="classref-section-separator"/>

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Property Descriptions

<a id="Slider_property_editable"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **editable** = `true` [ðŸ”—](#Slider_property_editable)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_editable**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **is_editable**\ (\ )

If ``true``, the slider can be interacted with. If ``false``, the value can be changed only by code.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="Slider_property_scrollable"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **scrollable** = `true` [ðŸ”—](#Slider_property_scrollable)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_scrollable**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **is_scrollable**\ (\ )

If ``true``, the value can be changed using the mouse wheel.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="Slider_property_tick_count"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](int.md) **tick_count** = `0` [ðŸ”—](#Slider_property_tick_count)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_ticks**\ (\ value\: [int](int.md)\ )
- [int](int.md) **get_ticks**\ (\ )

Number of ticks displayed on the slider, including border ticks. Ticks are uniformly-distributed value markers.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="Slider_property_ticks_on_borders"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **ticks_on_borders** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#Slider_property_ticks_on_borders)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_ticks_on_borders**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **get_ticks_on_borders**\ (\ )

If ``true``, the slider will display ticks for minimum and maximum values.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="Slider_property_ticks_position"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[TickPosition](Slider.md#enum_Slider_TickPosition) **ticks_position** = `0` [ðŸ”—](#Slider_property_ticks_position)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_ticks_position**\ (\ value\: [TickPosition](Slider.md#enum_Slider_TickPosition)\ )
- [TickPosition](Slider.md#enum_Slider_TickPosition) **get_ticks_position**\ (\ )

Sets the position of the ticks. See [TickPosition](Slider.md#enum_Slider_TickPosition) for details.

<hr class="classref-section-separator"/>

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Theme Property Descriptions

<a id="Slider_theme_constant_center_grabber"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[int](int.md) **center_grabber** = `0` [ðŸ”—](#Slider_theme_constant_center_grabber)

Boolean constant. If ``1``, the grabber texture size will be ignored and it will fit within slider's bounds based only on its center position.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="Slider_theme_constant_grabber_offset"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[int](int.md) **grabber_offset** = `0` [ðŸ”—](#Slider_theme_constant_grabber_offset)

Vertical or horizontal offset of the grabber.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="Slider_theme_constant_tick_offset"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[int](int.md) **tick_offset** = `0` [ðŸ”—](#Slider_theme_constant_tick_offset)

Vertical or horizontal offset of the ticks. The offset is reversed for top or left ticks.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="Slider_theme_icon_grabber"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[Texture2D](Texture2D.md) **grabber** [ðŸ”—](#Slider_theme_icon_grabber)

The texture for the grabber (the draggable element).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="Slider_theme_icon_grabber_disabled"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[Texture2D](Texture2D.md) **grabber_disabled** [ðŸ”—](#Slider_theme_icon_grabber_disabled)

The texture for the grabber when it's disabled.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="Slider_theme_icon_grabber_highlight"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[Texture2D](Texture2D.md) **grabber_highlight** [ðŸ”—](#Slider_theme_icon_grabber_highlight)

The texture for the grabber when it's focused.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="Slider_theme_icon_tick"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[Texture2D](Texture2D.md) **tick** [ðŸ”—](#Slider_theme_icon_tick)

The texture for the ticks, visible when [tick_count](Slider.md#Slider_property_tick_count) is greater than 0.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="Slider_theme_style_grabber_area"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[StyleBox](StyleBox.md) **grabber_area** [ðŸ”—](#Slider_theme_style_grabber_area)

The background of the area to the left or bottom of the grabber.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="Slider_theme_style_grabber_area_highlight"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[StyleBox](StyleBox.md) **grabber_area_highlight** [ðŸ”—](#Slider_theme_style_grabber_area_highlight)

The background of the area to the left or bottom of the grabber that displays when it's being hovered or focused.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="Slider_theme_style_slider"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[StyleBox](StyleBox.md) **slider** [ðŸ”—](#Slider_theme_style_slider)

The background for the whole slider. Affects the height or width of the [grabber_area](Slider.md#Slider_theme_style_grabber_area).
